name: cPanel Mania Beautifier
description: Turns cPanel Mania http://cpanelmania.blogspot.com more readable turning background from blue to white, black text, blue links. Also reduces title size and increases spacing between lines in posts.
additional_info:
cPanel Mania is a brazilian blog about cPanel, with lots of useful information from sysadmins involved with such platform. However, despite how useful it is, I hate its original theme, and find it hard to read.

Than I wrote this CSS, and decided to share with whoever wishes to have a better experience on this blog.
